title: Remove sliding/scrollbar UI element from the app

requirements.summary: Remove the sliding bar UI element from the app interface without breaking layout or navigation
acceptanceCriteria: The sliding bar element is no longer visible anywhere in the app
All four navigation views (Dashboard, Create Trip, Reports, Vehicles) render correctly without the sliding bar
The overall layout and spacing are not broken after removal
No console errors related to the removed element

file_operations.description: Inspect the App component for any sliding bar, progress bar, scroll indicator, or similar UI element in the render output or layout wrapper. Remove the element and any associated state or props while preserving the existing navigation structure and page routing logic.

Check the Header component for any sliding or animated UI elements (e.g., progress indicators, animated underlines on tabs, scroll bars). Remove any such element while keeping the navigation tab bar and logout button functional.

Review global styles for any CSS rules that create or style a sliding bar, progress bar, or scroll indicator (e.g., custom scrollbar styles, progress animations, sliding transitions). Remove or disable these styles without affecting the theme color tokens or layout utilities.
Check the global Tailwind CSS stylesheet for any custom CSS that implements a sliding bar or scroll indicator. Remove any such styles while preserving the theme custom properties and color tokens.
